question: Which organisation has signed a Memorandum of Understanding with Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT), for mutual data exchange?
option2: Securities and Exchange Board of India
answer: Securities and Exchange Board of India
explanation:
The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) and the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU), for mutual data exchange.
Both the organisations will share the required information available in their respective databases on an automatic and regular basis. Moreover, a Data Exchange Steering Group has been constituted for the initiative, that will review of data exchange status.
